title: Fright Forest
description: Raven Boy has short black spiky hair not unlike the feathers that adorn that sleek species of Corvus. Elf Girl is light of foot and sharp of mind and, well... elfish all over. She hadn't expected to meet Raven Boy, nor he her. And before they know it they are plunged into some very strange, gothic, creepy, altogether spooky and hilarious adventures as the two most unlikely heroes to save their world.The first in a brand new series, RAVEN BOY AND ELF GIRL, from the creators of the Blue Peter award-winning RAVEN MYSTERIES series.
author: Marcus Sedgwick
